page.title: 18TRANSPORT IN S.HARRIS
page.content:
{TRANSPORT There is a daily bus service to{ {Stornoway}, a distance of 80 km., Bus operators are {Harris Garage}, {Tarbert}.Bus leaves Leverburgh at 10 a.m. and returns at 8.30 p.m.
A daily ferry service operates a triangular route between {Tarbert , {Harris, Uig, Skye}and {Lochmaddy N {Uist}.The ferry ,"{HEBRIDES}"can convey about 50 cars as well as passengers.It is soon to be replaced by a bigger vessel after 20 years operating on this route. The service { is reduced in winter to 3 days per week .
A passenger ferry operates between {Leverburgh}and{Newton Ferry}in{N Uist.
